name: tmate
description: tmate is a terminal multiplexer with instant terminal sharing. It enables a number of terminals to be created, accessed, and controlled from a single screen and be shared with another mates.

name: Neofetch
description: Neofetch displays information about your operating system, software and hardware in an aesthetic and visually pleasing way.

name: ncdu
description: ncdu (NCurses Disk Usage) is a disk utility for Unix systems.

name: micro
description: micro is a terminal-based text editor that aims to be easy to use and intuitive, while also taking advantage of the capabilities of modern terminals.
